title: Get analytics for all bots
description: to use this api, user need to login first
name: All_bots_stats

Success 200.description: the previous day DAU to use comparison of the actual one (will be deprecated in v2 to become the drop/raise percentage)
the total new users in the defined period of time (will be deprecated in v2 use new_users instead)

the total new users in the opposite defined period of time.
Could be period in last year or last month or last week, depending on the period choosed
the number of messages received per hours of the day
the number of the messages sent per hours of the day
the most common requests from users sorted desc
the sentence(will be deprecated in v2 in profit of topic)
the rate of the sentence compared to other sentences
the users ratio per hours of the day

examples.content:
{
  "status": "success",
  "data": [
    "Help, support and information on CentrepointStores? You will find it here.",
    "ShippingOrdersTracking and DeliveryFastPayMy AccountReturns ProcessReturns PolicyPaymentsShukranOther InformationIn-Store",
    "Shipping",
    "ShippingOrdersTracking and DeliveryFastPayMy AccountReturns ProcessReturns PolicyPaymentsShukranOther InformationIn-Store",
    "Shipping",
    "\n\n",
    "When will I receive my order?",
    "Orders placed before 3:30 PM from Saturday to Thursday will be delivered the next business day, while orders placed after 3:30 PM (and all day Friday) will be delivered in 2-3 business days.",
    "Delivery will take a little longer if it is to one of these areas."
  ]
}
